Implemented API methods

Lukas Burk

2019-10-09

Source: vignettes/Implemented-API-methods.Rmd
Implemented-API-methods.Rmd

This is a reference list of API methods available, their endpoint URLs (with user-specified parameters indiciated by a : prefix) and a link to their respective implementation in this package, if applicable.
Note that not all available methods are listed here, especially those geared towards interactive apps.

Search

Method Endpoint Implementation
Text Query search/:type?query= search_query()
ID Lookup search/:id_type/:id?type= search_id()

Movies

Method Endpoint Implementation
Trending movies/trending movies_trending()
Popular movies/popular movies_popular()
Played movies/played/:period movies_played()
Watched movies/watched/:period movies_watched()
Collected movies/collected/:period movies_collected()
Anticipated movies/anticipated movies_anticipated()
Box Office movies/boxoffice movies_boxoffice()
Updates movies/updates/:start_date movies_updates()
Summary movies/:id movies_summary()
Aliases movies/:id/aliases movies_aliases()
Releases movies/:id/releases/:country movies_releases()
Translations movies/:id/translations/:language movies_translations()
Comments movies/:id/comments/:sort movies_comments()
Lists movies/:id/lists/:type/:sort movies_lists()
People movies/:id/people movies_people()
Ratings movies/:id/ratings movies_ratings()
Related movies/:id/related movies_related()
Stats movies/:id/stats movies_stats()
Watching movies/:id/watching N/A

Shows

Method Endpoint Implementation
Trending shows/trending shows_trending()
Popular shows/popular shows_popular()
Played shows/played/:period shows_played()
Watched shows/watched/:period shows_watched()
Collected shows/collected/:period shows_collected()
Anticipated shows/anticipated shows_anticipated()
Updated shows/updates/:start_date shows_updates()
Summary shows/:id shows_summary()
Aliases shows/:id/aliases shows_aliases()
Translations shows/:id/translations/:language shows_translations()
Comments shows/:id/comments/:sort shows_comments()
Lists shows/:id/lists/:type/:sort shows_lists()
Collection Progress shows/:id/progress/collection N/A (requires auth)
Watched Progress shows/:id/progress/watched N/A (requires auth)
People shows/:id/people shows_people()
Ratings shows/:ids/ratings shows_ratings()
Related shows/:id/related shows_related()
Stats shows/:id/stats shows_stats()
Watching shows/:id/watching N/A
Next Episode shows/:id/next_episode shows_next_episode()
Last Episode shows/:id/last_episode shows_last_episode()

Seasons

Method Endpoint Implementation
Summary shows/:id/seasons/seasons seasons_summary()
Season shows/id/seasons/season seasons_season()
Comments shows/:id/seasons/:season/comments/:sort seasons_comments()
Lists shows/:id/seasons/:season/lists/:type/:sort seasons_lists()
People shows/:id/seasons/:season/people seasons_people()
Ratings shows/:id/seasons/:season/ratings seasons_ratings()
Stats shows/:id/seasons/:season/stats seasons_stats()
Watching shows/:id/seasons/:season/watching N/A

Episodes

Method Endpoint Implementation
Summary shows/:id/seasons/:season/episodes/:episode episodes_summary()
Translations shows/:id/seasons/:season/episodes/:episode/translations/:language episodes_translations()
Comments shows/:id/seasons/:season/episodes/:episode/comments/:sort episodes_comments()
Lists shows/:id/seasons/:season/episodes/:episode/lists/:type/:sort episodes_lists()
People shows/:id/seasons/:season/episodes/:episode/people episodes_people()
Ratings shows/:id/seasons/:season/episodes/:episode/ratings episodes_ratings()
Stats shows/:id/seasons/:season/episodes/:episode/stats episodes_stats()
Watching shows/:id/seasons/:season/episodes/:episode/watching N/A

People

Method Endpoint Implementation
Summary people/:id people_summary()
Movies people/:id/movies people_movies()
Shows people/:id/shows people_shows()
Lists people/:id/lists/:type/:sort people_lists()

Users

Method Endpoint Implementation
Likes users/likes/:type N/A
Profile users/:id user_profile()
Collection users/:id/collection/:type user_collection()
Comments users/:id/comments/:comment_type/:type?include_replies= user_comments()
Lists users/:id/lists user_lists()
List users/:id/lists/:list_id user_list()
List Items users/:id/lists/:list_id/items/:type user_list_items()
List Comments users/:id/lists/:list_id/comments/:sort user_list_comments()
Followers users/:id/followers user_followers()
Following users/:id/following user_following()
Friends users/:id/friends user_friends()
History users/:id/history/:type/:item_id?start_at=&end_at= user_history()
Ratings users/:id/ratings/:type/:rating user_ratings()
Watchlist users/:id/watchlist/:type user_watchlist()
Watched users/:id/watched/:type user_watched()
Stats users/:id/stats user_stats()

Comments

Method Endpoint Implementation
Comment comments/:id comments_comment()
Replies comments/:id/replies comments_replies()
Item comments/:id/item comments_item()
Likes comments/:id/likes comments_likes()
Trending comments/trending/:comment_type/:type?include_replies= comments_trending()
Recent comments/recent/:comment_type/:type?include_replies= comments_recent()
Updates comments/updates/:comment_type/:type?include_replies= comments_updates()

Lists

Method Endpoint Implementation
Popular lists/popular lists_popular()
Trending lists/trending lists_trending()

Misc

These endpoints are used to check filter arguments. The output is cached in tidied up format as package datasets.

Section Method Endpoint Implementation
certifications List certifications/:type ?trakt_certifications
countries List countries/:type ?trakt_countries
genres List genres/:type ?trakt_genres
languages List languages/:type ?trakt_languages
networks List networks ?trakt_networks
